system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.

Effect: The user may freely move up to the Movement Score of their choice when declaring this attack. This attack is unaffected by the Abilitiesof other creatures.

Requirement: [Lunala] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Moongeist Beam on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.
